00012 #include "transform.h"

00014 // Transform Method Definitions
00015 ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const Transform &t) {
00016         t.m->Print(os);
00017         return os;
00018 }
00019 COREDLL Transform Translate(const Vector &delta) {
00020         Matrix4x4 *m, *minv;
00021         m = new Matrix4x4(1, 0, 0, delta.x,
00022                       0, 1, 0, delta.y,
00023                       0, 0, 1, delta.z,
00024                       0, 0, 0,       1);
00025         minv = new Matrix4x4(1, 0, 0, -delta.x,
00026                          0, 1, 0, -delta.y,
00027                          0, 0, 1, -delta.z,
00028                          0, 0, 0,        1);
00029         return Transform(m, minv);
00030 }
00031 COREDLL Transform Scale(float x, float y, float z) {
00032         Matrix4x4 *m, *minv;
00033         m = new Matrix4x4(x, 0, 0, 0,
00034                       0, y, 0, 0,
00035                       0, 0, z, 0,
00036                       0, 0, 0, 1);
00037         minv = new Matrix4x4(1.f/x,     0,     0, 0,
00038                              0, 1.f/y,     0, 0,
00039                              0,     0, 1.f/z, 0,
00040                              0,     0,     0, 1);
00041         return Transform(m, minv);
00042 }
00043 Transform RotateX(float angle) {
00044         float sin_t = sinf(Radians(angle));
00045         float cos_t = cosf(Radians(angle));
00046         Matrix4x4 *m = new Matrix4x4(1,     0,      0, 0,
00047                                  0, cos_t, -sin_t, 0,
00048                                  0, sin_t,  cos_t, 0,
00049                                  0,     0,      0, 1);
00050         return Transform(m, m->Transpose());
00051 }
00052 Transform RotateY(float angle) {
00053         float sin_t = sinf(Radians(angle));
00054         float cos_t = cosf(Radians(angle));
00055         Matrix4x4 *m = new Matrix4x4( cos_t,   0, sin_t, 0,
00056                                       0,   1,     0, 0,
00057                                  -sin_t,   0, cos_t, 0,
00058                                       0,   0,     0, 1);
00059         return Transform(m, m->Transpose());
00060 }
00061 
00062 Transform RotateZ(float angle) {
00063         float sin_t = sinf(Radians(angle));
00064         float cos_t = cosf(Radians(angle));
00065         Matrix4x4 *m = new Matrix4x4(cos_t, -sin_t, 0, 0,
00066                                  sin_t,  cos_t, 0, 0,
00067                                  0,      0, 1, 0,
00068                                  0,      0, 0, 1);
00069         return Transform(m, m->Transpose());
00070 }
00071 Transform Rotate(float angle, const Vector &axis) {
00072         Vector a = Normalize(axis);
00073         float s = sinf(Radians(angle));
00074         float c = cosf(Radians(angle));
00075         float m[4][4];
00076 
00077         m[0][0] = a.x * a.x + (1.f - a.x * a.x) * c;
00078         m[0][1] = a.x * a.y * (1.f - c) - a.z * s;
00079         m[0][2] = a.x * a.z * (1.f - c) + a.y * s;
00080         m[0][3] = 0;
00081 
00082         m[1][0] = a.x * a.y * (1.f - c) + a.z * s;
00083         m[1][1] = a.y * a.y + (1.f - a.y * a.y) * c;
00084         m[1][2] = a.y * a.z * (1.f - c) - a.x * s;
00085         m[1][3] = 0;
00086 
00087         m[2][0] = a.x * a.z * (1.f - c) - a.y * s;
00088         m[2][1] = a.y * a.z * (1.f - c) + a.x * s;
00089         m[2][2] = a.z * a.z + (1.f - a.z * a.z) * c;
00090         m[2][3] = 0;
00091 
00092         m[3][0] = 0;
00093         m[3][1] = 0;
00094         m[3][2] = 0;
00095         m[3][3] = 1;
00096 
00097         Matrix4x4 *mat = new Matrix4x4(m);
00098         return Transform(mat, mat->Transpose());
00099 }
00100 Transform LookAt(const Point &pos, const Point &look, const Vector &up) {
00101         float m[4][4];
00102         // Initialize fourth column of viewing matrix
00103         m[0][3] = pos.x;
00104         m[1][3] = pos.y;
00105         m[2][3] = pos.z;
00106         m[3][3] = 1;
00107         // Initialize first three columns of viewing matrix
00108         Vector dir = Normalize(look - pos);
00109         Vector right = Normalize(Cross(dir, up));
00110         Vector newUp = Cross(right, dir);
00111         m[0][0] = right.x;
00112         m[1][0] = right.y;
00113         m[2][0] = right.z;
00114         m[3][0] = 0.;
00115         m[0][1] = newUp.x;
00116         m[1][1] = newUp.y;
00117         m[2][1] = newUp.z;
00118         m[3][1] = 0.;
00119         m[0][2] = dir.x;
00120         m[1][2] = dir.y;
00121         m[2][2] = dir.z;
00122         m[3][2] = 0.;
00123         Matrix4x4 *camToWorld = new Matrix4x4(m);
00124         return Transform(camToWorld->Inverse(), camToWorld);
00125 }
00126 bool Transform::HasScale() const {
00127 #if 0
00128         float det = fabsf(m->m[0][0] * (m->m[1][1] * m->m[2][2] - m->m[1][2] * m->m[2][1])) -
00129                 (m->m[0][1] * (m->m[1][0] * m->m[2][2] - m->m[1][2] * m->m[2][0])) +
00130                 (m->m[0][2] * (m->m[1][0] * m->m[2][1] - m->m[1][1] * m->m[2][0]));
00131         return (det < .999f || det > 1.001f);
00132 #endif
00133         return false;
00134 }
00135 BBox Transform::operator()(const BBox &b) const {
00136         const Transform &M = *this;
00137         BBox ret(       M(Point(b.pMin.x, b.pMin.y, b.pMin.z)));
00138         ret = Union(ret,M(Point(b.pMax.x, b.pMin.y, b.pMin.z)));
00139         ret = Union(ret,M(Point(b.pMin.x, b.pMax.y, b.pMin.z)));
00140         ret = Union(ret,M(Point(b.pMin.x, b.pMin.y, b.pMax.z)));
00141         ret = Union(ret,M(Point(b.pMin.x, b.pMax.y, b.pMax.z)));
00142         ret = Union(ret,M(Point(b.pMax.x, b.pMax.y, b.pMin.z)));
00143         ret = Union(ret,M(Point(b.pMax.x, b.pMin.y, b.pMax.z)));
00144         ret = Union(ret,M(Point(b.pMax.x, b.pMax.y, b.pMax.z)));
00145         return ret;
00146 }
00147 Transform Transform::operator*(const Transform &t2) const {
00148         Reference<Matrix4x4> m1 = Matrix4x4::Mul(m, t2.m);
00149         Reference<Matrix4x4> m2 = Matrix4x4::Mul(t2.mInv, mInv);
00150         return Transform(m1, m2);
00151 }
00152 bool Transform::SwapsHandedness() const {
00153         float det = ((m->m[0][0] *
00154                   (m->m[1][1] * m->m[2][2] -
00155                    m->m[1][2] * m->m[2][1])) -
00156                  (m->m[0][1] *
00157                   (m->m[1][0] * m->m[2][2] -
00158                    m->m[1][2] * m->m[2][0])) +
00159                  (m->m[0][2] *
00160                   (m->m[1][0] * m->m[2][1] -
00161                    m->m[1][1] * m->m[2][0])));
00162         return det < 0.f;
00163 }
00164 Transform COREDLL Orthographic(float znear, float zfar) {
00165         return Scale(1.f, 1.f, 1.f / (zfar-znear)) *
00166                 Translate(Vector(0.f, 0.f, -znear));
00167 }
00168 COREDLL
00169 Transform Perspective(float fov, float n, float f) {
00170         // Perform projective divide
00171         float inv_denom = 1.f/(f-n);
00172         Matrix4x4 *persp =
00173             new Matrix4x4(1, 0,       0,          0,
00174                           0, 1,       0,          0,
00175                           0, 0, f*inv_denom, -f*n*inv_denom,
00176                           0, 0,       1,          0);
00177         // Scale to canonical viewing volume
00178         float invTanAng = 1.f / tanf(Radians(fov) / 2.f);
00179         return Scale(invTanAng, invTanAng, 1) *
00180                Transform(persp);
00181 }
